# Mantle of Spell Resistance
## Overview
**Aura** moderate abjuration; **CL** 9th

**Slot** chest

**Price** 90,000 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

This garment, worn over normal clothing or armor, grants the wearer spell resistance 21.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Spell Resistance (Spell)|spell resistance]]*

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 522
